item.title: 巴西政治：卢拉批准削减开支，支持财政规则
item.description: 财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）宣布，政府将削减 259 亿雷亚尔（约合 47 亿美元）的强制性开支，并称路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统已授权此举，国家财政框架将得到遵守。【原文：Finance Minister Fernando Haddad announced that the government would cut 25.9 billion reais ($4.7 billion) in mandatory expenses, saying President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva had authorized the move and that the country’s fiscal framework would be respected.】

item.title: 卢拉削减开支带来暂时缓解，巴西资产反弹
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）宣布削减开支，以帮助实现巴西的财政目标，这为市场提供了缓和，巴西资产周四再次普遍反弹。【原文：Brazilian assets broadly rallied again Thursday after Finance Minister Fernando Haddad announced spending cuts meant to help hit the country’s fiscal goals, providing a reprieve to markets.】

item.title: 民调显示勒庞将无法在法国获得多数票
item.description: 根据两家民调公司的预测，玛丽娜-勒庞的国民公署及其盟友将在周日举行的法国立法选举中远远无法获得绝对多数。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s National Rally and its allies are set to fall well short of an absolute majority in the French legislative election on Sunday, according to projections from two polling companies.】

item.title: 据说法国巴黎银行和瑞银集团对汇丰银行德国财富部门感兴趣
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，汇丰控股公司出售其德国财富管理部门的交易吸引了包括法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）和瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）在内的同行的初步兴趣，因为这家在伦敦上市的银行正寻求精简其全球业务。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s sale of its German wealth-management unit is attracting initial interest from peers including BNP Paribas SA and UBS Group AG, people familiar with the matter said, as the London-listed lender looks to streamline its global footprint.】

item.title: EQT 和德国大亨 10 亿欧元收购灰狗所有者 Flix 的股份
item.description: 收购公司 EQT AB 正与德国首富联手收购德国公共汽车和火车运营商 Flix SE 35% 的股份。【原文：Buyout firm EQT AB is teaming up with Germany’s richest man to acquire a 35% stake in German bus and train operator Flix SE.】

item.title: 据说中国和阿联酋正在商谈增加两国之间的航班数量
item.description: 在旅行增长多年停滞不前之后，中国和阿拉伯联合酋长国正在寻求增加双边航权，此举将努力促进两国之间的贸易和旅游业。【原文：China and the United Arab Emirates are seeking to increase bilateral air traffic rights after years of stagnant travel growth, a move that would seek to boost trade and tourism between the two nations.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司下调 8 月亚洲原油价格，显示需求疲软
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）连续第二个月下调了销往亚洲的所有等级石油的价格，这表明这个世界上最大的原油出口国认为其主要市场的需求持续疲软。【原文：Saudi Aramco cut prices for all of its oil grades to Asia for a second month in a sign that the world’s biggest crude exporter sees continued demand weakness in its main market.】

item.title: 美国主导的七国集团债务增长引发对 S&P 和范围的担忧
item.description: 两家信用评估公司强调，美国和富裕国家的债务持续上升，S&P 全球评级公司警告说，只有巨大的市场压力才能改变这一轨迹。【原文：Relentlessly rising debt in the US and rich-world peers was highlighted by two credit-assessment companies, with S&P Global Ratings warning that only acute market pressure can alter the trajectory.】

item.title: 欧洲 IPO 将难以维持上半年的反弹势头
item.description: 由于政治不确定性和动荡的股票市场导致希望上市的发行商数量减少，欧洲首次公开募股上半年的强劲表现不太可能在今年余下的时间里持续下去。【原文：A strong first-half showing for European initial public offerings is unlikely to be sustained in the remainder of this year, as political uncertainty and turbulent stock markets shrink the group of issuers eyeing listings.】

item.title: 贸易商评估干旱的越南降雨量，罗布斯塔咖啡上涨
item.description: 罗布斯塔咖啡期货上涨，原因是交易商对世界头号咖啡豆生产国越南的降雨量进行了监测，担心产量可能下降。【原文：Robusta coffee futures rose as traders monitor rainfall levels in Vietnam, the world’s top producer of the beans, amid concerns over potentially lower production.】

item.title: 监督机构称，澳大利亚到 2027 年将面临天然气短缺的风险
item.description: 一项独立调查显示，澳大利亚作为世界上最大的液化天然气运输国之一，在两年多一点的时间内就会面临天然气短缺的问题。【原文：Australia, one of the world’s largest liquefied natural gas shippers, faces a shortage within a little more than two years, according to an independent inquiry, which urged a boost to production to meet the challenge of rising demand.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员通过降息消除了部分通胀忧虑
item.description: 欧洲中央银行官员在上个月降息时没有考虑长期通胀问题；他们的政策会议记录显示，他们认为等待全面的物价数据会让他们为时已晚。【原文：European Central Bank officials looked past concern over longer-term inflation in cutting interest rates last month — arguing that waiting for a fully complete picture on prices would make them act too late, an account of their policy meeting showed.】

item.title: 津巴布韦从非盟机构获得 3200 万美元旱灾保险金
item.description: 津巴布韦从非洲联盟下属的非洲风险能力公司（African Risk Capacity）获得了 3180 万美元，作为该国因厄尔尼诺引发的干旱而遭受破坏的部分保险赔款。【原文：Zimbabwe received $31.8 million from African Risk Capacity, an arm of the African Union, as part of an insurance payout for the devastation the country suffered from an El Niño-induced drought.】

item.title: 历经坎坷，交易员恩格尔哈特在电力和天然气领域押下重注
item.description: Engelhart Commodities Trading Partners 上一次大规模交易实物商品时，三年内亏损了近 5 亿美元。现在，它的老板说情况不同了，因为公司在天然气和电力的购买和供应方面下了大赌注。【原文：The last time Engelhart Commodities Trading Partners traded physical commodities at scale it lost almost $500 million over three years. Now its boss says things are different as the firm bets big on buying and supplying natural gas and power.】

item.title: 澳大利亚的核辩论是代价高昂的分散注意力行为
item.description:
反对党联盟已将原子能重新提上日程。数字不符。【原文：

The opposition coalition has put atomic power back on the agenda. The numbers don’t add up.

】

item.title: 法国国家投资公司有意入股赛诺菲消费品部门
item.description: Bpifrance SACA 执行董事何塞-贡萨洛（Jose Gonzalo）表示，Bpifrance SACA 正在考虑对赛诺菲公司（Sanofi SA）消费者保健部门进行潜在投资，因为该公司正着眼于更大规模的保健投资。【原文：Bpifrance SACA is looking at a potential investment in Sanofi SA’s consumer health unit as it eyes bigger health investments, according to its executive director Jose Gonzalo.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷交易后瑞银价格受瑞士监管机构监控
item.description: 瑞士监管机构已开始监督瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）如何为其产品定价，因为人们担心瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）的收购可能会损害该国的竞争。【原文：A Swiss watchdog has started monitoring how UBS Group AG prices its products amid concerns that the takeover of Credit Suisse could hurt competition in the country.】

item.title: 肯尼亚的质疑者为违约保护付出了高昂代价
item.description: 致命的抗议活动迫使政府取消了增加税收的计划，这使肯尼亚的公共财政前景堪忧，肯尼亚正遭受一场新的投资者信心危机。【原文：Kenya is suffering a fresh crisis of investor confidence after deadly protests forced the government to scrap plans for more taxes, casting doubt on the outlook for its public finances.】

item.title: 莱恩称欧洲央行对国内通胀仍有担忧
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲中央银行并不完全相信欧元区产生的价格压力已得到充分控制。【原文：The European Central Bank isn’t fully convinced that price pressures generated in the euro area are sufficiently contained, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: Grifols 任命美国银行高管为首席财务官以平息投资者情绪
item.description: Grifols SA 已任命美国银行的一位高管为新任首席财务官，这家西班牙制药公司正努力让投资者放心。【原文：Grifols SA has named a Bank of America executive to be its new chief financial officer, as the Spanish pharmaceutical company works to reassure investors.】

item.title: 潘多拉最看空的分析师警告成本将对股价造成更大冲击
item.description: 潘多拉公司（Pandora A/S）最看跌的分析师认为，由于原材料价格上涨，这家丹麦饰品手镯制造商的股票不再有任何上涨空间。【原文：Pandora A/S’s most bearish analyst no longer sees any upside for shares of the Danish charm-bracelet maker due to pricier raw materials.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"石油生产作弊者几乎没有削减补偿的迹象
item.description: 为了支撑全球石油市场，欧佩克+正在推动成员国为违反供应配额的行为赎罪。然而，几乎没有迹象表明他们在忏悔。【原文：In its effort to shore up global oil markets, OPEC+ is pushing members to atone for cheating on their supply quotas. Yet there’s little indication that they’re repenting.】

item.title: 津巴布韦货币对美元汇率创历史新低，津巴布韦排除干预可能
item.description: 津巴布韦黄金支持的货币兑美元汇率跌至历史新低，因为该国货币当局排除了采取干预措施支持货币的必要性。【原文：Zimbabwe’s gold-backed currency weakened to a record low against the dollar, as the nation’s monetary authorities ruled out the need for intervention to support it.】

item.title: 埃尼公司和 Equinor 公司在尼日利亚的交易在拖延数月后获批
item.description: 随着石油巨头们继续退出这个西非国家的陆上业务，尼日利亚监管机构在拖延数月后批准了埃尼公司（Eni SpA）和埃奎诺公司（Equinor ASA）的出售计划。【原文：Nigerian regulators approved the sales of units of Eni SpA and Equinor ASA after months of delay as oil majors continue exiting problematic onshore operations in the West African nation.】

item.title: 阿联酋 IT 服务公司 Alpha Data 计划在阿布扎比首次公开募股 2 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于阿拉伯联合酋长国的 IT 服务公司 Alpha Data 正计划在阿布扎比进行首次公开募股。【原文：United Arab Emirates-based IT services company Alpha Data is planning an initial public offering in Abu Dhabi, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法兰克福首席执行官在德甲媒体交易失败后发出警报
item.description: 据德国职业足球联盟的一位高级管理人员称，该联盟正面临着转播权出售可能被推迟或失败所带来的严重后果。【原文：Germany’s professional football league is facing a serious fallout from a potentially delayed or failed sale of broadcasting rights, according to a senior league executive.】

item.title: 季风影响电力需求，印度液化天然气进口量将下滑
item.description: 由于季风雨导致天气转凉，电力需求下降，水力发电的增加又挤占了昂贵的燃气发电机的发电量，印度蓬勃发展的液化天然气进口很可能会放缓。【原文：India’s booming liquefied natural gas imports are likely to slow as cooler weather due to monsoon rains crimps electricity demand and increases in hydropower crowd out expensive gas-fired generators.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦征收牛奶税，现在卡拉奇的奶制品价格比巴黎还贵
item.description: 在征收新税后，巴基斯坦的牛奶价格飙升了五分之一以上，使这种主食奶制品的价格高于法国、澳大利亚和其他一些发达国家。【原文：Milk prices in Pakistan surged by more than a fifth after a new tax was applied, making the dairy staple more expensive than in France, Australia and some other developed nations.】

item.title: 印尼称 2025 年预算赤字可能低于预期
item.description: 印尼立法者同意扩大明年预算赤字的目标范围，赤字可能比之前估计的要少。【原文：Indonesian lawmakers agreed to a wider target range for the budget deficit for next year, with a likelihood that the shortfall could be smaller than previously estimated.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚总统阿比希望从国际货币基金组织和世界银行会谈中获得 105 亿美元资金
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚总理阿比-艾哈迈德说，埃塞俄比亚与国际货币基金组织和世界银行正在进行的讨论可能会促成 105 亿美元的资金。【原文：Ethiopia’s ongoing discussions with the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank may lead to $10.5 billion of funding, Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed said.】
